name: Agent Dipper
description:
The stars are disappearing- one by one. The night sky grows sparce.

You are an agent set out to find out what's going on with the disappearing stars.

Rumours of gambling them away with The Devil, talks of a mysterious man with a key, it's all very bizarre.

Interact with the stranger, darker inhabitants of the Parisian streets to gain intel on these activities and help stop the stars from disappearing, avoiding leaving your skies vast and empty.
